title: Diploma in Manufacturing Strategy
headline: Learn about quality management in operational excellence for world-class manufacturing from this free online course.
description: This free online course, Diploma in Manufacturing Strategy, will give you an insight into the vital tools and techniques for operational excellence to achieve world-class manufacturing standards. Learn about developing manufacturing and operations strategies, and critical factors for world-class manufacturing. Start this course today and improve your knowledge of business excellence.

courseDescription:
Diploma in Manufacturing Strategy is a free online course that guides you through the important tools of operational excellence for achieving world-class manufacturing standards. This course highlights the elements of manufacturing strategies and the importance of quality management for manufacturing excellence. The course begins with a discussion on manufacturing as a value addition process, components of operations systems, and functional dominance within organizational strategies.

Next, you will learn about scholarly contributions to manufacturing strategies, Generic Manufacturing Strategies (GMS), and the concepts of order winners and qualifiers in market analysis. Then, you will study the requirements in developing an operations strategy, manufacturing strategy taxonomy, and the role of Total Quality Management (TQM) in manufacturing. Finally, you will analyze the criteria of business excellence awards, process choice, product profiling, and various factors for achieving world-class manufacturing such as total employee involvement and flexible manufacturing systems.

This free online course will teach you the rudiments of developing effective and efficient manufacturing strategies to achieve world-class status in the industry. This course will be of great interest to students, researchers, employers, HR and Operations managers, and anyone who wants to study the essentials of business excellence through manufacturing. Begin this course today and improve your knowledge of essential operational ingredients.

Start Course Now
certificateDetail:
All Alison courses are free to enrol study and complete. To successfully complete this diploma course and become an Alison Graduate, you need to achieve 80% or higher in each course assessment. Once you have completed this diploma course, you have the option to acquire an official Diploma, which is a great way to share your achievement with the world.

Your Alison diploma is:
  • Ideal for sharing with potential employers
  • Include it in your CV, professional social media profiles and job applications.
  • An indication of your commitment to continuously learn, upskill & achieve high results.
  • An incentive for you to continue empowering yourself through lifelong learning.
Alison offers 3 types of Diplomas for completed Diploma courses:
  • Digital diploma: a downloadable diploma in PDF format immediately available to you when you complete your purchase.
  • diploma: a physical version of your officially branded and security-marked diploma, posted to you with FREE shipping.
  • Framed diploma: a physical version of your officially branded and security marked diploma in a stylish frame, posted to you with FREE shipping.
Start Course Now

All diploma are available to purchase through the Alison Shop. For more information on purchasing Alison diploma, please visit our FAQs. If you decide not to purchase your Alison diploma, you can still demonstrate your achievement by sharing your Learner Record or Learner Achievement Verification, both of which are accessible from your Dashboard. For more details on our diploma pricing, please visit our Pricing Page

modules.name: Module
modules.description: Learn more about the manufacturing processes and operations systems from this module. You will study the functional strategy within firms and achieving functional dominance within the corporate strategy.

modules.name: Module
modules.description: Learn more about manufacturing strategies in organizations from this module. You will study the Ps of manufacturing strategy, various contributions from scholars, and some generic manufacturing strategies.

modules.name: Module
modules.description: Learn how to develop manufacturing strategies in organizations from this module. You will study the phases of strategy development, characteristics of markets, and features of order winners and qualifiers.
topics: Introduction to Order Winner and Qualifiers
Characteristics and Dimensions of Order Winners and Qualifiers

modules.name: Module
modules.description: Learn more about developing manufacturing and operations strategies from this module. You will study the characteristics of various order winners and qualifiers, the methodology of developing an operations strategy, and Roth and Miller classification.
topics: Manufacturing and Operations Strategy - Learning Outcomes
Specific Order Winners and Qualifiers II
Specific Order Winners and Qualifiers III
Specific Order Winners and Qualifiers IV
Developing an Operations Strategy - Roth and Miller Classification
Manufacturing and Operations Strategy - Lesson Summary

modules.name: Module
modules.details: Diploma in Manufacturing Strategy - First Assessment
modules.description: You must score 80% or more to pass this assessment.

modules.name: Module
modules.description: Learn more about the importance of quality management in manufacturing excellence from this module. Get to study different manufacturing strategy taxonomy and effective implementation of Total Quality Management (TQM).
topics: Manufacturing and Quality Management - Learning Outcomes
Manufacturing and Quality Management - Lesson Summary

modules.name: Module
modules.description: Learn more about the requirements for manufacturing excellence from this module. You will discuss Deming's approach to quality management, various business excellence awards, process choice in performance excellence, and product profiling.

modules.name: Module
modules.description: Learn more about tools for achieving World Class Manufacturing (WCM) from this module. You will study the critical success factors for WCM, eliminating waste, the importance of total employee involvement, HR theories, and the elements of flexible manufacturing systems.

modules.name: Module
modules.description: Learn more about achieving world-class manufacturing standards from this module. Get to study alternative approaches to focus, the principles and techniques of the Toyota Production System, and examples of world-class organizations.
topics: Achieving World Class Status - Learning Outcomes
Achieving World Class Status - Lesson Summary

modules.name: Module
modules.details: Diploma in Manufacturing Strategy - Second Assessment
modules.description: You must score 80% or more to pass this assessment.

modules.name: Module
topics: Diploma in Manufacturing Strategy - Final Assessment

• Learning Outcomes
  • Upon successful completion of this module, you should be able to:
    • Explain the importance of manufacturing to economies and organizations
    • Identify the major sources of wealth creation
    • Indicate newer manufacturing destinations in the world
    • Define the various subsystems of the production system in manufacturing
    • Discuss the hierarchy of strategic management in organizations
    • Outline the considerations for developing functional strategy within a firm
    • Discuss functional dominance in corporate strategy
